verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H376>them<s%>, When any <S%H376>man<s%> hath an <S%H2100>issue<s%> out of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, because of his <S%H2101>issue<s%> he is <S%H2931>unclean<s%>.

And this shall be his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> in his <S%H2101>issue<s%>: whether his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H7325>run<s%> with his <S%H2101>issue<s%>, or his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> be <S%H2856>stopped<s%> from his <S%H2101>issue<s%>, it is his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%>.

Every <S%H4904>bed<s%> whereon he that hath the <S%H2100>issue<s%> <S%H7901>lieth<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>; and <S%H3627>everything<s%> whereon he <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>.

And <S%H376>whosoever<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> his <S%H4904>bed<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.

And he that <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> on <S%H3627>anything<s%> whereon he that hath the <S%H2100>issue<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.

And he that <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of him that hath the <S%H2100>issue<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.

And if he that hath the <S%H2100>issue<s%> <S%H7556>spit<s%> upon him that is <S%H2889>clean<s%>, then he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.
And what <S%H4817>saddle<s%> soever he that hath the <S%H2100>issue<s%> <S%H7392>rideth<s%> upon shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>.

And whosoever <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> anything that was under him shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>: and he that <S%H5375>beareth<s%> those things shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.

And whomsoever he that hath the <S%H2100>issue<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%>, without having <S%H7857>rinsed<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%>, he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.

And the earthen <S%H3627>vessel<s%>, which he that hath the <S%H2100>issue<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%>, shall be <S%H7665>broken<s%>; and every <S%H3627>vessel<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%> shall be <S%H7857>rinsed<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%>.

And when he that hath an <S%H2100>issue<s%> is <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> of his <S%H2101>issue<s%>, then he shall <S%H5608>number<s%> to himself <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> for his <S%H2893>cleansing<s%>, and <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>; and he shall <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H2416>running<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>, and shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%>.

And on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> to him <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtle-doves<s%>, or <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> them unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H259>them<s%>, the one for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a <S%H2403>burnt-offering<s%>; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> for his <S%H2101>issue<s%>.

And if any <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H7902>copulation<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H7364>him<s%>, then he shall bathe all his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.

And every <S%H899>garment<s%>, and every <S%H5785>skin<s%>, whereon is the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H7902>copulation<s%>, shall be <S%H3526>washed<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.

The <S%H802>woman<s%> also with whom a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H7902>copulation<s%>, they shall both <S%H7364>bathe<s%> themselves in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.

And if a <S%H802>woman<s%> have an <S%H2100>issue<s%>, and her <S%H2101>issue<s%> in her <S%H1320>flesh<s%> be <S%H1818>blood<s%>, she shall be in her <S%H5079>impurity<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: and whosoever <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> her shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.
And everything that she <S%H7901>lieth<s%> upon in her <S%H5079>impurity<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: everything also that she <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> upon shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>.

And whosoever <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> her <S%H4904>bed<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.

And whosoever <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> <S%H3627>anything<s%> that she <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> upon shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.
And if it be on the <S%H4904>bed<s%>, or on <S%H3627>anything<s%> whereon she <S%H3427>sitteth<s%>, when he <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> <S%H2930>it<s%>, he shall be unclean until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.

And if any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>with<s%> <S%H5079>her<s%>, and her impurity be upon <S%H2930>him<s%>, he shall be unclean <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; and every <S%H4904>bed<s%> whereon he <S%H7901>lieth<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>.

And if a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2100>have<s%> an <S%H2101>issue<s%> of her <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of her <S%H5079>impurity<s%>, or if she have an <S%H2100>issue<s%> beyond the <S%H5921>time<s%> of her <S%H5079>impurity<s%>; all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H2101>issue<s%> of her <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> she shall be as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H5079>impurity<s%>: she is <S%H2931>unclean<s%>.

Every <S%H4904>bed<s%> whereon she <S%H7901>lieth<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H2101>issue<s%> shall be unto her as the <S%H4904>bed<s%> of her <S%H5079>impurity<s%>: and <S%H3627>everything<s%> whereon she <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> shall be <S%H2931>unclean<s%>, as the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> of her <S%H5079>impurity<s%>.

And whosoever <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> those things shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>, and shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.

But if she be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> of her <S%H2101>issue<s%>, then she shall <S%H5608>number<s%> to herself <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, and <S%H310>after<s%> that she shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%>.

And on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> she shall <S%H3947>take<s%> unto her <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtle-doves<s%>, or <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons<s%>, and <S%H935>bring<s%> them unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a <S%H2403>burnt-offering<s%>; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for her <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> for the <S%H2101>issue<s%> of her <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%>.

Thus shall ye <S%H5144>separate<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from their <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%>, that they <S%H4191>die<s%> not in their <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%>, when they <S%H2930>defile<s%> my <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> that is in the midst of <S%H8432>them<s%>.

This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of him that hath an <S%H2100>issue<s%>, and of him whose <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3318>copulation<s%> <S%H3318>goeth<s%> from <S%H2930>him<s%>, so that he is unclean thereby;

and of her that is <S%H1739>sick<s%> with her <S%H5079>impurity<s%>, and of him that <S%H2100>hath<s%> an <S%H2101>issue<s%>, of the <S%H2145>man<s%>, and of the <S%H5347>woman<s%>, and of <S%H376>him<s%> that <S%H7901>lieth<s%> with her that is <S%H2931>unclean<s%>.
